name: 'Things Fall Apart' Online Trivia | 'West Wing' - Season 6 | 10 Questions

questions.text: While sitting in a bar, Josh and Will were watching a Governor speak at the Republican National Convention. Where was the Governor from?
questions.explanation:
Ohio.

	Governor Mike Fields kept repeating "eight is enough" referring to Bartlet's eight years in office. Josh mentioned that "Eight Is Enough" was a bad TV show and Will admitted to having a crush on the mother.

questions.text: What was one of Donna's concerns about Santos being Russell's Vice President?
questions.correct: Wants people to see the names reversed on the ticket
options: Too much voltage at the bottom of the ticket
Gets people ready for next time
questions.explanation:
Wants people to see the names reversed on the ticket.

	Donna and Josh were in the bar discussing Santos taking Russell's job offer of Vice President.

questions.text: Outside of what state did Josh say voters wouldn't elect a man in a leotard?
questions.explanation:
Minnesota.

	Josh was referring to Jesse Ventura who was a former wrestler turned governor of Minnesota.

questions.text: What did Ronna say that guys Josh's age have a thing about?
questions.explanation:
Bob Dylan.

	Ronna, Josh, and Santos were having lunch and Josh made a comment about "if wishes were horses". Ronna misunderstood the statement as lyrics to a Bob Dylan song and made a comment to Josh's age. Josh's comeback was 'guys my age?'.

questions.text: When Donna told Josh she had a good teacher, was she talking about him?
questions.explanation:
No.

	After Donna told Josh she had a good teacher, Josh thanked her. Donna told him she meant Will.

questions.text: Who did the President get to replace Rorsche as Chairman of the Democratic National Convention?
questions.explanation:
Leo.

	After the President saw that Rorsche was losing his mind over the candidates constant bickering, he put Leo in charge of the convention.

questions.text: What job did Helen tell Josh her dad ran for?
questions.explanation:
Dog catcher.

	Josh was telling Santos that it would he couldn't run for dog catcher if he tried to run again at a later time and Helen said her dad ran for dog catcher. Santos told Josh that he really didn't.

questions.text: Who caught Charlie sneaking out of Zoey's bedroom early one morning?
questions.explanation:
President Bartlet.

	Charlie had just left Zoey's room at one o'clock in the morning when the President saw him. Later that day, Charlie told the President that it wasn't the first time he and Zoey had been together and that he would like to see more of her.

questions.text: While watching Vinick speak at the Republican National Convention, how many votes did President Bartlet say Vinick picked up by talking about him?
questions.explanation:
5 million.

	Vinick's speech had to do with how well President Bartlet ran the country even with his MS. Leo and the President were watching in the residence and the President didn't like the fact that Vinick picked up 5 million votes by talking about him.

questions.text: Did Santos accept Russell's offer of Vice President?
questions.explanation:
No.

	After they left Russell's hotel room and entered the elevator, Josh told Santos he was proud that he hadn't accepted the job offer.
